The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

El Toboso, Toledo, Castile-La Mancha

Katherine Dau

Verified

In 1600 there was an Augustinian convent that included an chapel to the Virgin of los Remedios.

Devotion to the Virgin of los Remedios died out in the 19th century. However, she was restored as the patron of the town in 2009 with a new image.

Works cited

  1. “El Toboso,” Wikipedia 2.”Vestigios Esenciales” (El Toboso Parroquia)[http://eltobosoparroquia.es/vestigios-esenciales/]
